metadata.title: Ziqiang He's Website
metadata.description: Ziqiang He's personal space, a world full of creativity and technology

home.description: Welcome to my personal space, a world full of creativity and technology

about.title: Hey there! I'm Ziqiang
about.intro1: I'm a full-stack engineer with 9 years of experience in js/node/python development.
about.intro2: I've led the architectural design and development of systems with hundreds of millions of users (Taobao Double 11 activity building), and excel in web performance optimization and cross-platform responsive compatibility.
about.intro3: Over the past 2 years, I've embraced AI large model applications, not just for programming assistance, but also for practical implementation of AI clothing photography projects for cross-border e-commerce. I'm fluent in English and regularly communicate with international teams.
about.urbanicDescription: Responsible for cross-border e-commerce business technology development, including user research, interaction design, and visual design. Led the design work of several important projects, significantly improving product user satisfaction.
about.xiaohongshuDescription: Responsible for recommendation system frontend development, including user research, interaction design, and visual design. Led the design work of several important projects, significantly improving product user satisfaction.
about.alibabaDescription: Participated in system design work for multiple mobile applications and websites, including Double 11 promotion, responsible for user interface design and interaction design, and developed cross-functional team collaboration capabilities.
about.dingdingDescription: Participated in system design work for multiple mobile applications and websites, including Double 11 promotion, responsible for user interface design and interaction design, and developed cross-functional team collaboration capabilities.
about.universityName: East China University of Science and Technology
about.universityDescription: Bachelor of Science, National Key 985/211 Project University

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the projects I have completed recently, including both company projects and personal projects. Welcome any discussions.

projects.title: User Experience Design System
projects.description: A complete user experience system designed for large enterprises, including component libraries, design specifications, and interaction patterns.

projects.title: Brand Identity System
projects.description: A brand identity system created for startups, including logos, color systems, fonts, and application guidelines.
